mapper.select: SELECT tuser.user_code AS userCode, tuser.grade_code AS gradeCode, tuser.user_id AS userId, tuser.user_passwd AS userPasswd, info.user_name AS userName, info.user_address AS userAddress, info.user_tel AS userTel, info.user_nickname AS userNickname FROM TRIO_USERS tuser JOIN TRIO_USERS_INFO info ON tuser.user_code = info.user_code WHERE tuser.user_id = #{userId} AND tuser.user_passwd = #{userPasswd}
